summary: Email correspondence between FBI Special Agent Amanda Young and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding photos of Ghislaine Maxwell giving a foot massage, confirming the photos were on disks and discussing their inclusion in the CAIRES system as responsive evidence.

persons.name: Amanda N. Young
persons.context: FBI agent who confirms that photos of Maxwell giving a foot massage were on disks and is corresponding with a prosecutor about the evidence.

persons.name: Moe
persons.context: Prosecutor from the Southern District of New York who inquires about the origin of photos showing Maxwell giving a foot massage and wants to ensure they are marked as responsive in the CAIRES system.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the photos in question, shown giving a foot massage, which are being discussed as potential evidence in the case.

connections.description: FBI agent and prosecutor corresponding about evidence (photos) in the Epstein/Maxwell case.
Prosecutor handling evidence (photos) related to Ghislaine Maxwell's alleged activities.
FBI agent confirming possession of photos depicting Maxwell giving a foot massage as part of the investigation.

events.title: Inquiry about Maxwell photos
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney Moe emails FBI agent Amanda Young to ask about the origin of photos showing Ghislaine Maxwell giving a foot massage and to ensure they are marked as responsive in CAIRES.

events.title: Confirmation of photo location
events.description: FBI agent Amanda Young responds to confirm that the photos of Maxwell giving a foot massage were on disks.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Photos exist showing Ghislaine Maxwell giving a foot massage, which were stored on disks.
The photos were being reviewed for inclusion as responsive evidence in the CAIRES system.
The correspondence indicates ongoing evidence management and verification between the FBI and the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of New York.
